BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20095161 SCM, a proposed site for a new, approximately 560-seat Primary School Facility in the building currently occupied by the New York Foundling Hospital located at the southeast corner of West 17th Street and Avenue of the Americas. This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: School Construction,  560-seat Primary School Facility, Manhattan (20095161SCM)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20095161 SCM, a proposed site for a new, approximately 560-seat Primary School Facility in the building currently occupied by the New York Foundling Hospital located at the southeast corner of West 17th Street and Avenue of the Americas. This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
